item.title: Automatic Compass Calibration
item.description: This blog post covers how to automatically and continuously calibrate a magnetometer so that it can be used to calculate accurate headings. Calibration The samples from each axis usually have a different scale and offset from zero. One of the easiest ways for calibration to remove the offset and rescale the measurements.
